name: @deployable/node-zookeeper-client
description: A pure Javascript ZooKeeper client for Node.js.
author: Alex Guan <alex.guan@gmail.com>

scripts.release:patch: set -uex; rm -rf node_modules; yarn install; yarn run test:coverage; yarn run test:eslint; git push; npm version patch; npm publish; git push --tags;
scripts.release:test: set -uex; yarn test; npm version prerelease; git push; npm publish --tag testing; git push --tags
